descriptions:
['DescriptionThis amazing villa is nothing close to your regular Palm Jumeirah property. it comes fully equipped with several features which includes;
- Private pool
- Beach Access
- Extended Plot
- Mid - Number
- Mediterranean inspired Design
ABOUT PALM JUMEIRAH:
Palm Jumeirah is said to be an artificial archipelago. It is developed by Nakheel Property. Palm Jumeirah has been divided into many clusters which consist of Villas and Apartments. Palm Jumeirah is constructed on Persian Gulf and has outstretched itself till Dubai shoreline. Palm Jumeirah is the smallest island of the trilogy constructed on Persian Gulf that are Palm Deira and Palm Jebel Ali. Most of the luxurious apartments of Palm Jumeirah are located right in front of the ocean that provides a heavenly beach home for its residents. The area is given a shape of a palm tree with a crescent shaped water barrier which holds a symbolic importance in the real estate market of Dubai.
On the Palm Jumeirah some of the renowned and world’s most prestigious hotels are located that gives an iconic significance to it as it is one of the famous landmark of the city of Dubai. It is one of the main and the most desired luxurious area of Dubai that gives a breath taking view of the deep blue waves of the Persian Gulf. It is an epitome of beauty and deluxe living.']

['DescriptionBrought to you by Driven Properties, this 2 bedroom apartment is located in The Fairways West, The Views.\xa0
Unit Details:
● Rented until October 2020
● Low floor level
● Unit Type: Corner
● View: Golf
● Kitchen: Open and Fully Fitted
● Bathrooms: 2
● Built-in wardrobes
● Internal Area: 1,458 sqft
● Balcony Area: 238 sqft
● No. of Parking: 1
● Rental Estimate: AED 110,000
Building Amenities:
● Shared swimming pool and gym\xa0
● Close to Metro and Tram Station\xa0
● Easy access to the Shiekh Zayed Road
● 24 hours maintenance and security
Complimentary mortgage advisory through Driven Properties via partnerships with over 15 UAE banks.
Call our The Views expert for more information or viewing on +97144297040 for out of office hours or weekends call +971553658402.
.Since 2012, Driven Properties has grown to be one of the largest real estate platforms in the region. Through multiple branches in Dubai, Ajman, China, and Saudi Arabia, Driven Properties manages a portfolio of over 10,000 units.']
